title: Featured Projects
subtitle: Full-stack applications I've built and deployed

projects.title: Lab Booking Platform
projects.description: Complete solution with tests catalog, add to cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with Django, Mysql and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Voice Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent voice assistant capable of recognizing speech, processing user commands, and responding with synthesized voice output. The system supports real-time voice input, command execution, API integrations, and task automation using natural language processing.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: A full-featured inventory management system designed to track products, stock levels, suppliers, and orders in real time. The application includes role-based access, CRUD operations, low-stock alerts, and detailed inventory reports, ensuring efficient stock control and business operations.
